choices: ask again as a diffrent species
1.content: your a gigimon a small viral digimon just one day old and because you were a viral you were branded on the forehead with the digital hazard sign and thrown into asphodel, you had the good fortune that a mother roachmon took you in as its own but as you grow up you find another viral child, dead whilst still coated in its mothers blood from birth so you decided to build a shelter for any other living ones that you find but when did this occur.
1.title: age?

13.content: in your search of where to build your new haven you found an odd formation, one solitary mound of trash surrounded by other much larger mountains of it which hid the main one fro veiw except through one direction which you could enter at, this was naturaly fortafied and hidden, he used his fire breath to burn the ground of rotting matter to purge the smell and started searching for useful things and amongst the waste you found.
13.title: 13 years guilmon

131.content: he searches first through the scrap in his own mountain and is le to salvage a toolbox in good condition which would help him a lot in the near future, it contained a spanner, a wrench, a flathead screwdrider and a philips head, wire strippers, wire cutters, bolt cutters, a hacksaw, a hammer, a soldering iron, a nmall box of nails, screws, wires, electronic components and a DIY handbook which you flicked through in two seconds instantly absorbing all the information but then he heard a scittering, assuming it was a rat you turn around to kill it but see a kuramon, a tiny jellyfish digimon attrcted by the heat of the smoldering hill, he takes it up to a cave near the top of the mountain and asked his mother to look after it, he knew that when he was not around they would need protection shelter and food so he had better start with..
131.title: tool box

1313.content: he found a tin can and a wheal barrow he went round the montains putting edible food in the tin can and rotting matter in the wheal barrow, soon oth were full and he turned back picking up empty tin cans as well when he saw a tomato plant, the only healthy thing for miles around, he carfuly planted into one of the tin cans, after he got back he diced up the decaying matter and filled the empty tin cans with it as flower pots and then took seeds from the tomatoes and placed one in each placed the tins in the sun so that they could grow and added the tomato scraps to the food tin and fed it to the kuramon, which made it digivolve into a tsumemon, the todler equivelant of digimon, old enough to not need constant attention because digimon grew up fast but virals grow up faster but the diaroromon chain grew up even faster than that
1313.title: find a renewable food source

13132.content: whilst searching for shelter he found a cargo box, big enough to live in, it was damn difficult job getting it up the mountain but he did it then he found an old cars and took the chairs, heaters, air con, windows, battery and engine, he fitted them into the new base and brough tsunomon up to rest on the soft chair but he took the engine into the cave under the base and rigged it up to work as a generator for the battery
13132.title: shelter

131321.content: you spent about a day collecting useful parts, manakins, crash test dummies, cars, clocks, computers, old phones, anything even vaugly mechanicle and then took them back to the cave and took an almost functional computer and repaired it, and then made a transmitter out of phones and car radios and connected it to the computer and then made 10 recivers , 1 for each dummy or manacin, then hollowed out the chest and head of each, added hinges and motors to all the major joints and conected to a small cpu built in the chest cavity, which was connected to the reciver and a camera in the head, then pulled off a scale for each of them, as soon s the scale touched the circuitry it became an ai for the robots and the 10 finished robots stood at atenton arount the mountain.
131321.title: robots

choices: human born in virola but move to earth
15.title: ask again as a diffrent species

154.content:
your name is takato, you dont have a last name you were born as a viral human in the digital world but in the future digimon have been enslaved in the real world and you and your friends both human and digimon must work to rebel against the human discrace that would enslave innocent digimon.
your hair was a deep black and your voice was gruff from years of breathing in the ash in virola, you had been trained with ancient digimon techniques, marked fully with the viral marks, you wore a black studded belt with the digital hazard on it in red, wore a black trench coat and a backpack because evry pocket was filled with tech and weapons the best of which was a portal blade which was like a flaming red lightsaber and armour and you also wore studded black jeans.
154.title: human born in virola but move to earth

1542.content: guilmon was in gigimon form slunk over takatos sholder, terriermon was similar, renamon and monodramon were hiding in the trees whilst the four tamers got ahold of hats, caps, hoodies anything to cover up the marks of a viral, in earlier years they would have been easier to hide but these days evryone knew about digimon and virals wernt exactly liked, they then spread out looking for possible bases bearing in mind that they wernt just hiding, they were going to be waging war, henry found a supply shed in the park but knew it would not sufice, takato found an old warehouse on the outskirts of the city, rika found the house of some basterds that abused teir digimon, ryo found a failing mall.
1542.title: get a base

15422.content: they decided that they could expand into those areas later if they needed to but for now they should baptise their new campaign in the blood of slave drivers, the place was relativly big and nice, it had tthree beds so after some arguing and ryo making a crude joke about sharing with rika they agreed to take turns sleeping on the sofa,it had the digivices and computers of the previous owners, a well stocked fridge and a tv, they freed the captive digimon
15422.title: basterds

choices: continue with current story and get the weapons
go to the after d reaper pre tense
1543.content: ok i want to add the option to changing the pretence to being that you are gallantmon just after the fight with the d reaper but both takato and guilmon had grew up in Virola and don't nessisarily get on with the other biomerges.
1543.title: get some weapons

15432.content: you had rescued jeri weather she wanted to be or not and crushed th d reaper a lot faster than otherwise due to being a true warrior and were just now getting off grani at the base. "good job evryone" said yamaki "well to all of us who deserve congragulations, *cough*viral " said sukuyamon who was data and had grown up in tracal and was prejudice to virals, "hey he may be a viral but he did easily twice your work" said megagargomon who was currently outside the dreadnought, he was a vaccine who grew up on earth ad sympathised for virals, "watch what you say to my consort, remember she may be my queen one day" said justimon who grew up in tracal and was the current hair to the throne and was dating sukuyamon. "just ignore them gallantmon" said ryli "lets try to get some of that blood off of you" its true you were covered in blood and some of yamakis technicians were responsible for looking after the biomerges whilst they were on earth
15432.title: go to the after d reaper pre tense

154322.content: you returned to the forms of takato and guilmon and ryli and the other technitions were shocked at the apearance of you, both of you were branded with viral symbols and various insults and curses covering most of your skin but the ones on your foreheads were outlined with tatoos and you were both clearly malnourished despite being fairly muscular and has scars that are up to an inch deep in some places, ryli asks how you became like this.
154322.title: return to mortal forms

1543222.content: "well my parents were humans in tracal and humans can be classed as viral, vaccine ect but I had the misfortune to be born a viral and so I was marked and beaten and cursed and like every viral thrown out into the wastelands to die, oh and I know my parents didn't cry for me because one of my marks is a note from my mother telling me how disappointing my existence is, anyway a group of digimon surviving in a new village called virola adopted me and there I met guilmon and we became partners, the vaccines were not pleased by this because it was belied that only holy individuals could become partners and virals were not supposed to be holy so they put a price on my head so guilmon and I had to run until a year later they found me and said that they needed my help in defeating the d reaper
1543222.title: tell takatos story

154322211.content:
"you see the other guys are not just warriors, megagargomon is a "handler" basicly means zoo keeper to keep me in line, but I am glad that he respects me, justimon is a representative of tracal to show that this is all official, and sakuyamon is an executioner, my executioner, they were always going to kill me but they said that this way I would get to see earth just before I die, and it was so worth it... sakuyamon may kill me at any time she pleases now."
"couldn't you escape here on earth"
"If I did then they would attack virola and I would have that blood on my hands, and besides I couldn't keep guilmon hidden and if he can't live then I welcome death, besides even if I could hide guilmon and there were no consequences they attached these"
you pull back a hoodie that you were wearing and reveal a pair of chrome digizoid horns
"they screwed these into my skull so that I could never blend into an earth society"
154322211.title: yes

choices: no, thats stupid and your stupid two
15433.content: how about you being takato and all things are just like begining of the real series but you do things diffrently
15433.title: go to a diffrent pretense

154331.content: you and henry and guilmon and terriermon had just taken out some wild ones and are walking back to the park and a shadowy figure walks up to you and says "your playing a dangerous game, digimon are wild creatures" (this was yamaki) "right.." says takato "based on the fact that you know about digimon and think that they are dangerous i would asume your part of whatever team is sending all the time there is an incident with a digimon" "well your pretty sharp" said yamaki "well you would have to be an idiot not to notice but the real issue is that you cant stop them, you cant even tell where they emerge otherwise you would have intervined and we would have seen you before now so we are obviously better at this than you" "is this a threat?" " no this is a good idea you have resources but cant acualy stop digimon but we can stop digimon but have barley any resources, so you should hire us" said henry
154331.title: yeah lets go with that

154332.content: ok then what if you are a member of another digimon group who interacts with a viral group
154332.title: no, thats stupid and your stupid two

1543321.content: how about the dats team from season five
1543321.title: yes, definetly

info.brief_description: the first virals build their city on a mountain of garbage
info.description: in tracal when a digimon is born it is inspected and if its data or vaccine type it is allowed to live but if its viral its thrown into asphodel which is a landfill the size of a small country, this is a story of how a few survived and built virola, the first viral city
